result.eng: Do you need more?

result.html: An bhfuil níos mó de dhíth ortDo you need more?

result.eng: I would like more milk please.

result.orig: Ba mhaith liom níos mó bainne le do thoil
result.html: Ba mhaith liom níos mó bainne le do thoilI would like more milk please.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom níos mó bainne le do ṫoilI would like more milk please.

result.eng: There were more than twenty people there.
result.ga: Bhí níos mó ná fiche duine ann
result.orig: Bhí níos mó ná fiche duine ann
result.html: Bhí níos mó ná fiche duine annThere were more than twenty people there.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí níos mó ná fiċe duine annThere were more than twenty people there.

result.eng: Drugs are taken mostly by young people.
result.ga: Daoine óga is mó a chaitheann drugaí
result.orig: Daoine óga is mó a chaitheann drugaí
result.html: Daoine óga is mó a chaitheann drugaíDrugs are taken mostly by young people.
result.ponchtml: Daoine óga is mó a ċaiṫeann drugaíDrugs are taken mostly by young people.

result.eng: I'd say I had more to drink that he.
result.ga: Déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigesean
result.orig: Déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigesean

result.ponchtml: Déarfainn go raiḃ níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a ḃí aigeseanI'd say I had more to drink that he.

result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ga: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.orig: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.html: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ponchtml: Is iad na Polannaiġ an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin aṁlaiḋ toisc a ṁéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.eng: They don't make any more.
result.ga: Ní dhéantar níos mó iad

result.eng: I won't play football any more.

result.html: Ní imreoidh mé peil níos móI won't play football any more.
result.ponchtml: Ní imreoiḋ mé peil níos móI won't play football any more.

result.eng: There is no energy in me anymore.

result.eng: I need more time to examine the question properly.

result.eng: He is a mechanic. He doesn't like that job anymore.

result.orig: Is meicneoir é Ní maith leis an obair sin níos mó

result.eng: We are [usually] in the library and the lab most of the time.

result.eng: You can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
result.ga: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar
result.orig: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar

result.eng: I get on well with her, for the most part.

result.eng: The biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.

result.eng: The question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?

result.eng: It seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.

result.eng: We live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ga: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.

result.eng: Will the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?
